Common OLAP Operations 
• 
Slice is the act of picking a rectangular subset of a cube by 
choosing a single value for one of its dimensions, creating a 
new cube with one fewer dimension 
7 
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/OLAP_cube 
Common OLAP Operations 
• 
Dice  produces a subcube by allowing the analyst to pick 
specific values of multiple dimensions 
8
